emails.subject: Re: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment
emails.cc: Pablo Figueroa; Nicolas Chaperon; Benoit Baliguet
emails.body_text:
I found where the glitch is:
Between the BF environment and the DNextR environment, although dashboards are within the EU BlackFryers business category, they do not show up as such in the DNextR environment
From BF environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category


From DNextR environment, "All Dasboards"  business category


From DNextR environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category:


From my understanding, we should see: BF environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category = DNextR environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category

Regards,

Quentin


________________________________

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Wednesday, 3 September 2025 12:08
To: Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>; Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Benoit Baliguet <benoit.baliguet@dnext.io>
Cc: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment 
 

Hello,

 

Not sure if it’s only you, when I go to the “EU Black Fryers” I get this :



 

 

Saber Khalfallah

if i navigate to the black fryer section i cannot find this dashboards for example.

 

 



________________________________

To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io <mailto:quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Benoit Baliguet <benoit.baliguet@dnext.io <mailto:benoit.baliguet@dnext.io> >

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Sent: Thursday, August 28, 2025 1:00 PM
To: Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io <mailto:quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Benoit Baliguet <benoit.baliguet@dnext.io <mailto:benoit.baliguet@dnext.io> >
Cc: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io <mailto:nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io> >; Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io <mailto:pablo.figueroa@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment 

 

Hello Quentin,

 

*	For the 1st point 
	=> you should now not see Biofuels & Fertilizers in Business Categories there was a Dashboard for some Reason the “G&O SnD > Europe > Oilseeds Crush Capacity” Dashboard had the Biofuels Business Categories  

As for Renaming I need the dev team permission & the necessary role as I cannot do that now 

 

*	For the 2nd point I need the dev team help & permission as well
	adding @Benoit Baliguet <mailto:benoit.baliguet@dnext.io> 

 

*	For the 3rd point can u please check now it should be good 

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io <mailto:quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, August 28, 2025 11:06
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io <mailto:nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io> >; Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io <mailto:pablo.figueroa@dnext.io> >
Subject: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment

 

Dear Saber, Dear Support Team,

 

Please see below a list of adjustments that I would like the BF environment of the platform to reflect:

 

1.

Business Categories\Dashboards

Remove Biofuels, Fertilizers, EU Black Fryers

Renaming the system entities:

Grains & oilseeds to be called Grains & Oilseeds

Meat to be called Meat, Livestock & Feed

Eu Black Fryers to be called EU BlackFryers



 

 

2.

Breadcrumb trail

The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:

“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds



 

“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed



 

“tradeflow” => Tradeflow



 

“weather” => Weather



 

“sugar” => Sugar



 

“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers



 

3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories

Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.

It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

 

*****************************

 

I can provide more explanations if needed.

 

Best Regards,

 

Quentin
emails.body_html:
I found where the glitch is:
Between the BF environment and the DNextR environment, although dashboards are within the EU BlackFryers business category, they do not show up as such in the DNextR environment
From BF environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category

From DNextR environment, "All Dasboards"  business category

From DNextR environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category:

From my understanding, we should see: BF environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category = DNextR environment, "EU Black Fryers" business category

Regards,

Quentin

To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Benoit Baliguet <benoit.baliguet@dnext.io>

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, August 28, 2025 1:00 PM
To: Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Benoit Baliguet <benoit.baliguet@dnext.io>
Cc: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io>; Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment

 

Hello Quentin,

 

  • For the 1st point
    => you should now not see Biofuels & Fertilizers in Business Categories there was a Dashboard for some Reason the “G&O SnD > Europe > Oilseeds Crush Capacity” Dashboard had the Biofuels Business Categories  

As for Renaming I need the dev team permission & the necessary role as I cannot do that now

 

  • For the 2nd point I need the dev team help & permission as well
    adding @Benoit Baliguet

 

  • For the 3rd point can u please check now it should be good

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Quentin Doublet <quentin.doublet@blackfryers.io>
Sent: Thursday, August 28, 2025 11:06
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Nicolas Chaperon <nicolas.chaperon@dnext.io>; Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>
Subject: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment

 

Dear Saber, Dear Support Team,

 

Please see below a list of adjustments that I would like the BF environment of the platform to reflect:

 

1.

Business Categories\Dashboards

Remove Biofuels, Fertilizers, EU Black Fryers

Renaming the system entities:

Grains & oilseeds to be called Grains & Oilseeds

Meat to be called Meat, Livestock & Feed

Eu Black Fryers to be called EU BlackFryers

 

 

2.

Breadcrumb trail

The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:

“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds

 

“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed

 

“tradeflow” => Tradeflow

 

“weather” => Weather

 

“sugar” => Sugar

 

“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers

 

3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories

Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.

It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

 

*****************************

 

I can provide more explanations if needed.

 

Best Regards,

 

Quentin

Subject: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment

 

Dear Saber, Dear Support Team,

 

Please see below a list of adjustments that I would like the BF environment of the platform to reflect:

 

1.

Business Categories\Dashboards

Remove Biofuels, Fertilizers, EU Black Fryers

Renaming the system entities:

Grains & oilseeds to be called Grains & Oilseeds

Meat to be called Meat, Livestock & Feed

Eu Black Fryers to be called EU BlackFryers



 

 

2.

Breadcrumb trail

The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:

“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds



 

“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed



 

“tradeflow” => Tradeflow



 

“weather” => Weather



 

“sugar” => Sugar



 

“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers



 

3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories

Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.

It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

 

*****************************

 

I can provide more explanations if needed.

 

Best Regards,

 

Quentin

Dear Saber, Dear Support Team,

 

Please see below a list of adjustments that I would like the BF environment of the platform to reflect:

 

1.

Business Categories\Dashboards

Remove Biofuels, Fertilizers, EU Black Fryers

Renaming the system entities:

Grains & oilseeds to be called Grains & Oilseeds

Meat to be called Meat, Livestock & Feed

Eu Black Fryers to be called EU BlackFryers

 

 

2.

Breadcrumb trail

The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:

“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds

 

“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed

 

“tradeflow” => Tradeflow

 

“weather” => Weather

 

“sugar” => Sugar

 

“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers

 

3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories

Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.

It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

 

*****************************

 

I can provide more explanations if needed.

 

Best Regards,

 

Quentin

The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:

“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds

 

“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed

 

“tradeflow” => Tradeflow

 

“weather” => Weather

 

“sugar” => Sugar

 

“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers

 

3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories

Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.

It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

 

*****************************

 

I can provide more explanations if needed.

 

Best Regards,

 

Quentin

emails.subject: Adjustments to the DNext BF Environment
emails.body_text:
Dear Saber, Dear Support Team,

Please see below a list of adjustments that I would like the BF environment of the platform to reflect:

1.
Business Categories\Dashboards
Remove Biofuels, Fertilizers, EU Black Fryers
Renaming the system entities:
Grains & oilseeds to be called Grains & Oilseeds
Meat to be called Meat, Livestock & Feed
Eu Black Fryers to be called EU BlackFryers

 
 
2.
Breadcrumb trail
The spelling of some categories is not consistent with the rest of the platform:
“grains_oilseeds” => Grains & Oilseeds

 
“livestock_and_meat” => Meat, Livestock & Feed

 
“tradeflow” => Tradeflow

 
“weather” => Weather

 
“sugar” => Sugar

 
“eu_black_fryers” => EU BlackFryers

 
3.Allocation of Dashboards to business categories
Lineups group: Europe\France, Portugal, Romania, Spain are not showing within the BlackFryers environment although their labelling is already showing EU BlackFryers.
It probably needs to be adjusted somewhere else.

*****************************

I can provide more explanations if needed.

Best Regards,

Quentin
